General.Name: Jiangsu Huaxicun Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Huaxicun Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of polyester chemical fibers in China and internationally. The company operates through Special Chemical Fiber, Chemical Terminal, and Foreign Investment segments. It offers polyester staple fibers for spunlace for use in spunlace, acupuncture, and other equipment, as well as hygiene materials, medical treatment and wiping, automobiles, filtration, leather, and engineering infrastructure; and semi-dull polyester staple fibers, bright polyester staple fibers, fluorescent whitening polyester staple fibers, etc. for use in textile industry, as well as fibers of needle punching and chemical bonding specifications, which are used in various fields, such as pure spinning, blended spinning, spunlace, and knitting. The company offers its products under the Huaxi Village brand name. It also provides petrochemical logistics and warehousing services, such as terminal loading and unloading, warehousing, barge transfer, pipeline transportation, and storage of liquid chemicals comprising multiple berths with a berthing capacity of 50,000 tons, as well as 8 storage tank areas in the reservoir area with 89 storage tanks with a total volume of 307,600 cubic meters. In addition, the company is involved in the construction, operation, warehousing, and support service of wharf; sales of chemical fiber, etc.; technology development of new materials; manufacture and sale of industrial textile products; sale of synthetic fibers; equity investment; and banking business. Jiangsu Huaxicun Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.
